messages.content: I’m sorry but [NAME] has better memes
This cheat... what would that be? I may have made a choice I'm currently regretting.
[NAME]... I'm sorry. This is just wrong. I, can't.
I’m so sorry the internet has inconvenienced you
Okay, I'll try to find one. Sorry about that.
I do feel sorry for the squirrel, but I wouldn't say the dog is a jerk for acting on natural instinct.
Sorry to hear about that and hope you have moved on.
I'm sorry it happened like that for you. I really can't imagine.
I thought that was gonna be the Pelicans after [NAME] is gone(sorry Pelicans fans)
It was a terrible, terrible thing to do. He did every day of his time for it, has expressed regret, and has not repeated it.
I'm sorry your trust has been that badly broken.
just apologize. what other advice could you possibly require? you fucked up, now deal with it.
Ugh I'm sorry man! Jerk off until your heart is content and don't apologize for it!
Sorry for your loss yesterday. Your team is poised to do even better in the years to come and hopefully they will.
So America and the USSR are the exact same thing to you? Sorry you're so small minded, hope you learn to grow in the future.
Sorry you can’t enjoy things cause other people enjoy them lol. Your loss
I'm sorry, I can't hear your useless badgering over me drinking my 38' from a wine bottle and enjoying my extra $200.
Damn, I really been playing this series all my life...and I ain’t got any regrets.
